phrases: Once you dive in, it will immediately bare its fangs and attack.
But there is nothing to fear.
Thrust your fingers into the surface
Then you slide your body through that opening.
Moving your arms, your head, your chest...
His swimming always looks so smooth.
He transferred into our class last week.
Nobody can beat you when you are in the water, Haru-chan.
I want to swim like you!
You are as fast as the rumors said.
I do not care about my time.
That is just like the rumors said, too.
in entering a relay with me at the next tournament?
That is right, I do not care about swimming faster times.
All I want is to feel the water.
With my skin, my eyes, my soul...
To never doubt what it makes me feel.
There was some funky stuff going through my head back then.
There is an old saying my late grandma taught me.
When you are ten, they call you a prodigy.
When you are fifteen, they call you a genius.
Once you hit twenty, you are just an ordinary person.
About three years until I am ordinary.
I cannot wait to be ordinary.
I told you to lay off the -chan.
You were in the bath with your swimsuit on again?
You are going to be late.
Wait, why are you grilling fish?!
And you are wearing an apron over a swimsuit.
I do not want to get oil on my swimsuit.
Why did you come get me?
You did not show up for the opening assembly yesterday.
Do you know which class you are in, then?
We are in the same class again.
We have got a new lady as our homeroom teacher.
They already gave her a nickname.
but she is a little on the odd side.
It needs to get warmer so I can swim in the ocean.
I hope it gets warmer soon so you can swim.
I am used to being mistaken for a girl.
I am Amakata Miho, your new homeroom teacher.
I heard Miss Ama-chan is from this area.
She went to college in Tokyo and found a job there,
but she came back after her dream fell through.
Maybe she wanted to go into music?
We are supposed to be learning from a woman
who became a teacher as plan B?
Want To eat on the roof?
He needs to get a clue.
And do not call me Gou!
Or do you want some of this?
I will be joining you here at Iwatobi High School.
How many years has it been?
I do not think I saw you after the swimming club was shut down.
Yep, because I went to a different school.
There are cherry blossom trees next to the pool!
Were not there cherry blossom trees next to the pool
Can you stop calling me that?
But that is your name, Haru-chan.
But that pool is old and not in use.
There is no swim club, either.
I was all excited about getting to swim with you again in high school!
We are not little kids anymore.
Things are not the way they used to be.
Haru cannot live without being in water.
During the summer, he swims in the ocean,
and he was soaking in the tub this morning.
What does that have to do with swimming?
That just means he likes baths.
How about a hot springs club?
Let us start a hot springs club!
Nagisa has not changed one bit.
I did not say anything yet.
Aw, I should have gotten the same thing you did.
The swimming club we went to in grade school is going to be torn down soon.
So before that happens, why do not we pay a visit?
We can sneak in at night...
Do not you think it will be fun?
Why do not you just humor him?
No, it is too much effort.
But there is a pool there.
A pool is much bigger than a bathtub.
His mom went with his dad when he had to move because of work.
Nobody's forcing you to eat it.
Haru-chan was always a good cook.
So, are you sure about this?
Were not you all for it earlier?
Is it okay for just the three of us to dig it up?
Rin-chan is not in Japan anymore.
I will not be attending middle school here.
You mean you are going to a different country?
Yep, I am going to a swimming school.
What are you trying to do?
I am going to become an Olympic swimmer.
Why did not you tell us?
I will swim in the relay.
I am leaving the day after the tournament.
So this will be the last time the four of us swim together.
That is why you have to swim in the relay.
I will show you a sight you have never seen before.
They say the place is haunted.
People have been seeing shadows moving around
Well, it is all mental anyway,
so sugar will still get the job done.
It is one of the oldest mistakes out there.
My foot hit an empty can.
You are doing this on purpose, are not you?!
You always were scared of the dark.
It is not as trashed inside as I expected.
This is the picture from when we won the relay.
I will show you a sight you have never seen before.
The four of us won this together,
so it does not make sense for one person to take it home.
So let us put it in a time capsule
and dig it up when we are grown up.
Think the marker is still there?
Can we pick up the pace a little?
I did not think I would run into you guys here.
What are you doing here, though?
Some unseen force brought us all here at this exact
Haru, you are still hanging out with these guys?
What are you talking about, Rin?
Why do not I show you?
I will show you how different we are now.
They are going to swim here?
Haru, that is a bad idea!
Wait, you have been wearing that the whole day?!
That is why I told you to stop.
Did you guys come here for this?
I do not need this thing anymore.
No, it was not a dream!
I do not get it though.
Why would a look-alike challenge you to a race?
We used to do that at the swimming club!
What is wrong with you guys?!
Sorry, I was not paying attention.
What they have in common is
that they used to belong to the same swimming club.
I am only one year older than you!
And Haru's the same age as me!
And they are all boys with girlish names.
What is your relationship with them?
That means you have something in common with them, too.
Since you are a girl with a boyish name.
but it is still trespassing if you enter without permission!
Think back to what Li Bai once said.
In human life, accomplishment must bring total joy.
Do not allow an empty goblet to face the moon.
You only have one life, so you should do what you want.
It would be foolish not to drink from the glass placed before you.
Does he really go to our school?
If he is back from Australia,
he might have transferred into our school.
But I did not see him at the opening ceremony.
That was Rin's sister, Matsuoka Gou!
So you also chose Iwatobi High School, Gou-chan.
Your name is Gou, like the Sengoku warlord Azai Nagamasa's third daughter, right?
But the typical reading is Kou, so call me that.
That would be the nice thing to do.
But what are you doing at Haru's place?
I wanted to ask him about my brother.
So Rin is really back from Australia?
He returned last month and he is attending Samezuka Academy now.
It is a boarding school, so he has not come home.
Do not you want to see Rin?
Here I was thinking you would finally get to swim if you came.
Samezuka is supposed to have an indoor pool.
Do not take your clothes off here!
You are the one who brought me here to swim!
Let us wait until practice is over and everyone is gone.
That teacher earlier told us to do what we want with our li
I still think this is a bad idea.
Haru-chan still reminds me of a dolphin.
Mako-chan, let us swim with him.
We will get in trouble if they find us!
Anyway, we need to look for Rin.
We can take a little dip first.
Nobody will find us if we do not turn on the lights.
But you did not bring a swimsuit.
I am not going to join you
You got to be kidding me!
You looked like an elephant falling in.
What are you guys doing here?
We came here to see you.
I told you that I only swim freestyle.
About three years until I am ordinary.
I guess it could not hurt to wait a little longer.
I want you to show me that sight again.
I have forgotten what it was that I saw.
But it will not be the same this time.
I will be showing you something completely different.
So is there a reason Nanase-san can only swim freestyle?
Haru-chan does not want to answer.
Mako-chan, can you answer for him?
Should I use salt or miso on my fish?
Next time: Memories in the Distance.
You even did the preview for him?
I am up for some Meuniere sauce.
